content.text:
# Warhammer 40,000: Mechanicus II

| series = Warhammer 40,000
}}
Warhammer 40,000: Mechanicus II is an upcoming turn-based tactics video game developed by Bulwark Studios and published by Kasedo Games. It is a sequel to the 2018 game, Warhammer 40,000: Mechanicus, and was announced in May 2024.
Gameplay
Warhammer 40,000: Mechanicus II will give the player a choice to play as one of two factions, the Necrons, and the Adeptus Mechanicus. The game will use turn-based strategy mechanics.
Release
Warhammer 40,000: Mechanicus II is in development by Bulwark Studios. A gameplay trailer for the game was posted on 22 May, 2025. On 2 October 2025 a demo was released on Steam.
